headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: Open URL that you want to get the internal link for.

parameters.name: url_type
parameters.description: Type of the open TikTok URL. Enum: USER_PROFILE VIDEO : Video detail page HASHTAG_CHALLENGE : Hashtag challenge page MUSIC : Music page STICKER : Sticker (special effect) page STICKER_SHOOTER : Shoot a video with a sticker (special effect).
